entry.title: Titan - Half Size Shallow Aluminum Steam Table Pans - 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Titan
Type: Disposables
Price: 46.99

Conserve your food's temperature and enhance your presentation with this Half-size foil steam table pan!

Great for cooking, storing, and serving all your entrees, sides, appetizers, and desserts, this versatile pan is perfect for banquets and events of any size. It provides unparalleled temperature retention and can hold up to 104 fl. oz. of your signature menu items.

Aluminum Foil Construction

Durable 35 gauge aluminum foil will stay strong throughout the entirety of your event while providing a polished look.

Full Curl Rim

Flexible rim can be easily bent to cover all the pan's edges.

Designed for Easy Stacking

Allows users to compactly store and transport pans on top of one another.

Titan - 11.7" x 9.3" x 1.77" Shallow Aluminum Steam Pan With Plastic Dome Lids Combo - 24/Case

entry.title: Titan - Foil Lids for Half Size Aluminum Steam Pans - 100/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Titan
Type: Disposables
Price: 36.99

Details

Conserve your food's hot temperature with this Half size foil steam table pan lid. Perfectly sized to fit your half size steam table pan (sold separately), this lid provides a tight seal for your sides, appetizers, and desserts! All you need to do is press the foil around the pan's rim in order to keep your food at its ideal temperature.

Made of 30 gauge aluminum foil, this durable lid enables you to compactly store and transport food pans for your catered event or banquet without worrying about loss of heat. Plus, the disposable design is ideal for quick cleanup at your event's conclusion. It's also recyclable, so you can be environmentally conscious with your take-out service! Until you're ready to unveil your scrumptious food, provide a polished appearance on your buffet line with this lid!

Designing and creating products with the cost-efficient consumer in mind, provides high-quality items for a low, economical price, and this product is no exception. For an easy solution to your take out needs, look no further than this food storage solution !

entry.title: King Of Spice - Steak Spice Ground - 700 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: King of Spice
Type: FOOD
Price: 13.99

King Of Spice - Steak Spice Ground - 700 g

Try adding this spice to salsa, guacamole, and taco or enchilada sauces for extra flavor, or allow guests to season their own meals via front-of-house condiment stations. Whether you run a Mexican or Indian restaurant, pizzeria, or upscale bistro, this spice is sure to take your food to the next level.

Its a pantry staple that can be used in marinades, tomato-based sauces, and soups. Whether you own a pizzeria, Italian restaurant, or upscale bistro, this spice is the perfect addition to all of your favorite menu items.

The unique and delicious flavor and aroma is commonly used in Asian, Middle Eastern, Latin American, and Italian cuisines. However, it also works well with traditional Canadian and American dishes.

The bulk pack of spices is a cost-efficient option for high-volume kitchens and can easily be portioned into smaller quantities. Dehydrated spices also last longer than fresh ingredients and are easier to store, making them the perfect addition to any busy, high-output kitchen.

entry.title: IMG Satin - Heavy Duty Plastic Spoon Clear - 14 x 40 pcs/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: IMG Satin
Type: Disposables
Price: 22.99

IMG Satin - Heavy Duty Plastic Spoon Clear - 560 / Pack

For simple convenience, add this heavy weight plastic spoon to your take-out restaurants, cookouts, and catered events.

Easily complete your plastic cutlery set with these durable, spoons. Conveniently disposable, you won't have to waste any extra time washing large quantities of dishes. Plus, its sleek coloring is complementary to virtually any dining environment and can be dressed up or down according to the atmosphere of your event!

Heavy Weight Construction

Despite being created to throw away after use, this plastic spoon features the heavy weight design that is expected from traditional flatware. The sturdy polystyrene construction prevents it from bending, breaking, or snapping even when it is being used with heavy foods such as chicken and steak.

Rounded Edges

Thanks to its smooth, rounded edges, this spoon provides a comfortable dining experience for your customers.

Sleek Design

The handle features an intricately sleek design to add a touch of sophistication to your table setting.

entry.title: Yeseco - Mini Black PP Spoon 88MM - 250/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yeseco
Type: Disposables
Price: 5.99

Yeseco - Sample/Taster/Catering Spoon Black - 250 / Pack

Give customers a small sample of the products you have to offer with this plastic tasting spoon!

Perfect for your ice cream shop or food truck, this petite spoon allows your customers to taste some of your unique ice cream or frozen yogurt flavors so they can order several scoops that they're certain to enjoy. If you're implementing a new menu in your restaurant or bakery, use these tasting spoon to introduce some of your new dishes to your customers and increase sales.

Durable Plastic

Its durable construction provides quality, single-service use and is sturdy enough to hold samples of thick jams, sauces, and desserts.

Conveniently Disposable

Once your guests are finished, this plastic tasting spoon can easily be disposed of for fast, convenient clean up.

Our Mini Black PP Spoons are 88mm in length. They are made from virgin (no recycled PP used) PP material making it 100% recyclable. They are perfect for sampling soups, ice creams, yogurts, etc… They are widely used for restaurant business as well as sampling at the trade shows.

  • 100% RECYCLABLE
  • GREAT STRENGTH
  • ULTRA LIGHT
  • ULTRA SMOOTH SURFACE
  • 2000 PER CASE
  • GREAT ADDITION TO RESTAURANT OR SAMPLING TABLE
